text: WBQO (93.7 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of St. Simons Island, Georgia. The station is owned by QBS Broadcasting, LLC, and airs a news/talk format. The station was assigned the WBQO call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on June 8, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * BQO Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:News and talk radio stations in the United States Category:Glynn County, Georgia
title: WBQO
